item.title: FAQ
item.description: Keyboard shortcuts for search? focus: Ctrl + / select: ↓ and ↑ open: Enter close: Esc GoCD Stage not getting assigned an agent There are three possibilities: Pipeline not in the correct Environment. Check to see if the pipeline is in the environment by logging into GoCD. Navigate to Admin at the top menu and select Environments in its drop down. Find your environment and click on it to expand it.
